[[Jackie Parker]] | stadium = [[Empire Stadium (Vancouver)|Empire Stadium]] | playoffs = '''Lost West Semi-Final''' | uniform = Image:CFL BCL Jersey 1969.png }} The '''[[1969 CFL season|1969]] [[BC Lions]]''' finished in 3rd place in the West Division with a 5â11 record. After taking the club to a 1â9 record, head coach [[Jim Champion]] was relieved of his duties and assistant coach [[Jackie Parker]] took over. Parker led the club to a 4â2 finish and an unlikely playoff berth. The offense continued to struggle and managed to score only 22 touchdowns.
